title: Thank you!
subtitle: Your message has been sent successfully!

parts: You will receive a response within 24-48 hours. If it takes a bit longer, I'm probably busy with other projects. Please allow an extra 1-2 business days.
If you haven't heard back after that time, there might have been an issue with the message. In that case, feel free to email me at
Thanks again, and have a great day!

seo.metaDescription: Your message has been successfully sent. Thank you for getting in touch.
seo.ogDescription: Confirmation page after submitting the contact form.
seo.author: María T. Fernández
